item.title: IHE.ITI.PDQm#2.3.0
item.description: The Patient Demographics Query for Mobile (PDQm) Profile defines a lightweight RESTful interface to a patient demographics supplier leveraging technologies readily available to mobile applications and lightweight browser based applications. (built Mon, Nov 8, 2021 09:47-0600-06:00)
item.dc:creator: IHE
